content: sizes us 5/6½ - 7½/9 - 9½/10½ eu 35/37 - 38/40 41/43 foot length approx 22 - 24 - 27 cm / 8¾ -9½ -10½ leg length approx 16 - 18 - 20 cm / 6 1/4 -7 -8 materials drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-100 g color 911 picnic 50 g in all sizes in color 542 green the piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group a see the link below drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm / us 1 5 or the size needed to get 26 stitches and 34 row stockinette stitch on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height
